package.name: fred
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} export PATH=/usr/compat.old/qt4/bin:$PATH bash autogen.sh ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var qmake make
package.install:
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/fred
install -m 0755 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/fred ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin/ install -m 0644 fred/*.pdf fred/*.fred ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/fred
cat << DESKFILE > ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/fred.desktop
[Desktop Entry] Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Type=Application Name=FRED Registry Editor Categories=CB-Other; Exec=sudo /usr/sbin/fred Icon=wine Terminal=false StartupNotify=true Path=
DESKFILE
